    • Constructor Detail

      • Database

        public Database(@NotNull
                @NotNull DatabaseCore core)
         throws Database.ConnectionException
        Creates a new database and validates its connection.

        If the connection is invalid, this will throw a ConnectionException.

        Parameters:
        core - The core for the database, either MySQL or SQLite.
        Throws:
        Database.ConnectionException - If the connection was invalid

    • Method Detail

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the database

      • copyTo

        @Deprecated
public void copyTo(@NotNull
                               @NotNull Database db)
                        throws SQLException
        Deprecated. 
        Copies the contents of this database into the given database. Does not delete the contents of this database, or change any settings. This may take a long time, and will print out progress reports to System.out

        This method does not create the tables in the new database. You need to do that yourself.

        Parameters:
        db - The database to copy data to
        Throws:
        SQLException - if an error occurs.

      • execute

        public void execute(@NotNull
                    @NotNull String query,
                    @NotNull
                    Object... objs)
        Executes the given statement either immediately, or soon.
        Parameters:
        query - The query
        objs - The string values for each ? in the given query.

      • hasColumn

                         @NotNull

                  throws SQLException
        Returns true if the given table has the given column
        Parameters:
        table - The table
        column - The column
        Returns:
        True if the given table has the given column
        Throws:
        SQLException - If the database isn't connected

      • getConnection

        public Connection getConnection()
        Fetches the connection to this database for querying. Try to avoid doing this in the main thread.
        Returns:
        Fetches the connection to this database for querying.
